channel.title: Need help 317 server
channel.description:
can someone help me with this?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[url=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/donatorshop.png/]http://img525.imageshack.us/i/donatorshop.png/[/url] how i get the items in it to 10 or 50 or something like that?
ps: if ur coder pm me!!

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Try to eat another shark whilst you are wearing a Weapon in-game such as a Whip or something.
That should solve your Eating problem. IF NOT, It will be because your potions.java or wherever you food coding is kept has been changed or not coded correctly.

And LOGOUT of your account to SAVE your game.

Read full topic

don’t get that :eek:

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

You probably Have no weapon worn when you were eating the shark, try it again with a weapon on.
If you are just clicking the X on your run.bat it will most likely not save, log out before you do this to save your character game.
OR
If you have notepad open and you log out and save your notepad file (Of your character file) if you keep saving it then your char will be rolled-back to whenever you opened the notepad file.

Read full topic

Also, it’s probably sM, and not sendMessage.
So change it accordingly.

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:11, topic:330028”]You get those errors because you are using methods that aren’t declared in your client.java.

Try replacing the teleportToX with toX, teleportToY with toY, and sendMessage with sM.[/quote]
client.java:8283: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable ToX
location: class client
ToX = 3281;
^
client.java:8284: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable ToY
location: class client
ToY = 2765;
^
client.java:8285: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessage(“Welcome to the staffzone!!”);
^
3 errors
Finished!
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

this still come… can somebody use pics?

btw i use pk planet source

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

You’re trying to compile something when you don’t have the method.

What base are you using?

Example… You can’t find teleportToX/Y method…

It’s like if you go to buy a BigMac at Burger king… It’s not there…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

You get those errors because you are using methods that aren’t declared in your client.java.

Try replacing the teleportToX with toX, teleportToY with toY, and sendMessage with sM.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:3, topic:330028”]thank’s but i got anothere question i want to make a command ::staffzone i got a generator but i don’t know where i need to put the code then… code is

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)&& playerRights >= 1){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage(“welcome to the donator zone!”);

}
[/code][/quote]

You need to add that in client.java
Once you have opened client.java
Hit CTRL + F and Search for a command you already have, such as master… So you’d search for “Master” (with the quotation marks).

And you should see something along the lines of:

	if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) {
		for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
			addSkillXP(14000000, i);
		}
	}

(Yours will most likely say addSkillXP(14000000, 1))
many more times than mine and the end number will change from 1 to 2 to 3 to 4 to 5 each time.

Anyway that was irrelevant.
You want to paste your code on the line AFTER the LAST ‘}’.

If your struggling, I will get pictures for you.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

thank’s but i got anothere question i want to make a command ::staffzone i got a generator but i don’t know where i need to put the code then… code is

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)&& playerRights >= 1){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”)){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage(“welcome to the donator zone!”);

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Go into Shops.cfg
Find the Shop keeper you want to change the Stock of
Find the Item ID you want to change and next to it will be a 0 or however many there are in the shop.
Change the 0 to however many you want.

Read full topic
